title: Jamie's easy mild chicken or pork curry
ingredients: ['750g pork or chicken, cut into chunks', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons mild curry powder (or to taste)', '2 tablespoons paprika (or to taste)', '1 dessertspoon groundnut oil', '3 large mushrooms, chopped', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 apple, peeled cored and chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons turmeric (or to taste)', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of mushroom soup', '500ml double cream', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 cloves of garlic']
